nodes.text: Around 332 BBY, the Galactic Republic undertook a mapping project of hyperspace. The project was intended to make hyperspace travel safer. A century after the project began, Jedi Master Douglas Sunvale referenced the mapping project while reassuring Dalnan Ambassador Janex that their planned journey through hyperspace aboard the Steady Wing would be safe despite the recent Great Hyperspace Disaster and ongoing Emergences. The Steady Wing's journey would be cut short, but due to onboard sabotage instead of an Emergence.
